name: Mimikatz through Windows Remote Management
description: Detects usage of mimikatz through WinRM protocol by monitoring access to lsass process by wsmprovhost.exe.
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`((winlog.event_data.TargetImage:*\\lsass.exe AND process.executable:C\:\\Windows\\system32\\wsmprovhost.exe) AND (NOT (winlog.event_data.GrantedAccess:0x80000000)))`
